QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Changing your urostomy pouch
QAPair.Answer: Urostomy pouches are special bags that are used to collect urine after some types of bladder surgery. The pouch attaches to the skin around your stoma, the hole that urine drains from. Another name for a pouch or bag is an appliance. You will need to change your urostomy pouch often.
